metadata.title: Caf√© Tertulia - Your Premier Breakfast Spot in Santiago de Compostela

pages.description: Discover Caf√© Tertulia, a beloved cafeter√≠a in Santiago de Compostela, serving exquisite coffee, delicious vegetarian options, and a range of hearty breakfasts. Enjoy friendly service, and take in delightful views just a short walk from the Cathedral.
pages.title: Caf√© Tertulia - Your Premier Breakfast Spot in Santiago de Compostela
pages.content: Caf√© Tertulia - Your Premier Breakfast Spot in Santiago de Compostela Overview Photos Menu Reviews Location Caf√© Tertulia 4.7 ( 2975 reviews ) 07:15 AM - 11:00 PM See Hours ‚Ç¨1‚Äì10 R√∫a do Pombal, 2, 15705 Santiago de Compostela, A Coru√±a, Spain Updating... Discover This Place Caf√© Tertulia, nestled in the heart of Santiago de Compostela, is a true gem for coffee enthusiasts and breakfast lovers alike. Customers rave about the high-quality coffee , which reflects the care and passion poured into each cup. Many reviews highlight the friendly and efficient service , creating a welcoming atmosphere that feels like a favorite local haunt. Ashley King describes the experience as a "5-star" delight, with standout dishes like the avocado tosta topped with cream cheese and nuts. The caf√© is praised for its flexible menu , catering to dietary preferences with options like vegetarian dishes and milk alternatives . Moreover, the ambiance is enhanced by its proximity to local landmarks, making it a perfect stop for enjoying breakfast while soaking in the views of the nearby cathedral . Simon Garneau appreciates the savory breakfasts that break away from the traditional sweet pastries, emphasizing fresh ingredients and generous portions. Whether you‚Äôre there for the small chocolate cake served alongside your drink or a hearty bagel with cream cheese and Serrano ham, Caf√© Tertulia promises a delightful start to your day in this charming Spanish city. Amenities and More üõé Service options Offers takeaway Serves dine-in No delivery üöª Amenities Has gender-neutral toilets See more Inside Caf√© Tertulia Reviews For Caf√© Tertulia Ashley King Jul 10,2025 Definitely 5 star. I came across the caf√© while out early taking photos. It was a blessing finding such excellent coffee and a tosta with avocado, cream cheese and nuts. Service was friendly and efficient. The atmosphere was tops. It‚Äôs obviously the chosen breakfast coffee stop for many locals. I recommend it highly. If you want a great view of the cathedral, go to the right when you leave the caf√© and look left down the first road. It‚Äôs worth the visit. B Graf Jul 7,2025 Great place for breakfast/brunch. They have vegetarian options and are very flexible to add or remove foods. They also have milk alternatives, i.e oat milk. M B Jul 3,2025 Great coffee and breakfast spot. The coffee here is great quality, you can tell that they put a lot of care into it without being pretentious. The food was delicious, with the bagel being a lot lighter than I expected. Great service as well, and accommodating to allergies. David van Dorsten Jul 1,2025 Great coffee and orange juice. Busy in the mornings and you might have to wait for a table. Free small chocolate cake pieces for the table. Simon Garneau Jun 28,2025 Just a 7 minute walk from the Cathedral. If you've had it with sweet buns, Madeleines, and sweet croissants for breakfast, this is the place for you. They have a wide variety of hearty, healthy, and most importantly, savoury breakfasts here. The price is right, the ingredients are fresh, and the service is friendly. I had the poppy bagel with cream cheese, Serano ham, and arugula. Yum! DANNY LIN May 24,2025 Busy cafe especially on mornings serving tasty breakfast. Overall an enjoyable place. Jeremy Hancock May 15,2025 Great place close to cathedral (5minute walk) situated close a busy road, but this is not an issue for me. Menu very reasonable about ‚Ç¨4-5 per plate. They serve snacks and filled bagels which are very tasty. Very food good and quantity just about right.
